page.title: 09ROADS
page.content:
The table below shows the length of {metalled roads}in each grid square:
| 2.8 0.5 1.4 1.1 | | | distances | 2.0 0.0 2.1 0.4 | in | | kilometres | 1.3 1.0 2.1 1.2 | { } The main Sidmouth-Honiton road runs north-south through the block and carries moderate traffic. Other roads are small, many with high hedges on each side. Most of these small roads are very old and the main Honiton road once ran past Plyford farm. {Bus services}are seasonal (summer) and all who live in the area depend totally on the motor car. Most homes will have telephone and television.
